valmo.geco.control
Class StageBuilder

java.lang.Object
  valmo.geco.control.BasicControl
      valmo.geco.control.StageBuilder

public class StageBuilder
extends BasicControl

StageBuilder is currently responsible for persistence of Stage and its data. It provides functions to load/save Ã’r or Geco data (using RegistryBuilder as backend) as well as backup function.

Since:
Nov 23, 2008
